comments.text:
Steps to Reproduce
---------------------------------------
1. right click on the taskbar in the firefox icon (i put it there)
2. left click on Anonymous Navigation

What should have happened:
---------------------------------------
It should open the firefox windows in anonymous navigation mode



What actually happened:
----------------------------------------
It opens firefox window without anonymous navigation mode
